entry.title: VDG-2 (pet carrier)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Dog Carry Bag
Price: 34.00

These stylish and practical felt dog carriers are perfect for any small breeds.The carriers are crafted from wet felting technique and lined internally with soft cotton fabric. Strong felted handles can be worn over the shoulder, the zip and internal collar clasp keep your dog secure.

  • 100% wool
  • Interior cotton lining
  • Zipper Closer
  • Azo free dyes

Care Instructions: Shake off or vacuum to remove any dirt.
If needed hand wash with warm water with few drops of laundry soap. 
Use towel to dry remove excess water and then air dry it. 

Size: Length 21" x Width 9" x Height 10"

 

Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
